com.cyc.session

Interface CycSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CycAccessSession<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CycClientSession

    public interface CycSession
    An active (or potentially active) session with a Cyc server. Implementation to be provided by the SessionFactory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  CycSession.SessionStatus
      The connection status of a CycSession.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CycSessionConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the CycSessionConfiguration used to configure this session.
      SessionOptions getOptions()
      Returns a set of modifiable options, including the name of the cyclist making assertions, and the project's KE purpose.
      CycServerInfo getServerInfo()
      Provides basic information about the state and location of the server to which the CycSession is connected (or was connected.) If the CycSession has not been initialized (i.e., getStatus().equals(SessionStatus.UNINITIALIZED)) this method should return null.
      CycSession.SessionStatus getStatus()
      Returns the current status of the session.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        CycSession.SessionStatus getStatus()
        Returns the current status of the session.
        Returns:
        the current SessionStatus

      • getOptions

        SessionOptions getOptions()
        Returns a set of modifiable options, including the name of the cyclist making assertions, and the project's KE purpose. The session's configuration may provide defaults for these options, or possibly prevent certain options from being changed.
        Returns:
        the current SessionOptions

      • getConfiguration

        CycSessionConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Returns the CycSessionConfiguration used to configure this session. These settings cannot be modified.
        Returns:
        the original CycSessionConfiguration

      • getServerInfo

        CycServerInfo getServerInfo()
        Provides basic information about the state and location of the server to which the CycSession is connected (or was connected.) If the CycSession has not been initialized (i.e., getStatus().equals(SessionStatus.UNINITIALIZED)) this method should return null.
        Returns:
        CycServerInfo for the session's server, or null if CycSession is uninitialized.
